## chart() function

Applies chart properties to a selection. This is intended to use with the d3 selection.call mechanism. Warning: this modifies the selection!

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function chart(svg: Selection<Element, any, Element, any>, theme: Theme, options?: ChartOptions): Selection<Element, any, Element, any>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  svg | Selection&lt;Element, any, Element, any&gt; | d3 Selection to configure chart area for. Usually a <svg>. |
|  theme | Theme | the theme |
|  options | [ChartOptions](./d3.chartoptions.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> |

<b>Returns:</b>

Selection&lt;Element, any, Element, any&gt;
